name: O2 CORP
description:
We've contacted you because we've heard you're the best there is, and we need a shipment of Oxygen recovered. Do us a favor and try not to use it all. 

You're playing the role of a Mercenary (Bolli or Merc Lobar) sent out to recover a stolen shipment of oxygen meant to hit the shelves of AstroMart last Thursday. Prepare to fight Pirates who have abandoned their humanity and gone full cybernetic and Aliens who want to make a meal out of you.

Code: Raúl Rita

Audio: Yagich

Art: Thomas Leonard
